item.description:
The American Repertory Theater is performing Sophocles's Ajax, we are having a meeting to see that play and get together for a coffee afterwards. Let's all buy our tickets on our own and let's meet at the box office after the play and/or probably before the play as well.

 

http://www.americanrepertorytheater.org/events/show/ajax
item.how_to_find_us: Meeting is at the ticket box.
item.why: Every once in a while we try to incorporate other philosophy related activities. I guess the scarcity of extant texts from the 5th century BC Greece makes everything "philosophy related" from that era.
item.name: Sophocles's Ajax in ART
